sentences.english: Xiao Zhaowei snow solar term, before and after, three categories of patients more.
sentences.chinese: 肖诏玮介绍，小雪节气前后，三类病人比较多。

sentences.english: What does the solar term Insects Awaken mean?
Chushu solar terms in each year around August 23.
sentences.chinese: 处暑节气在每年八月二十三日左右。

sentences.english: By the sundial the solar term can be known too.
sentences.chinese: 该日晷还能确定当时所处的节气。

sentences.english: The carburetor obtains this enrichment by the addition of a choke valve in the carburetor throat above the venture and main nozzle.
sentences.chinese: 所以在节气门和主喷管的上方增加了一个阻风门。

sentences.english: Three types and their properties of gas valves of electronic control automobile engine are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了电控发动机节气门体的三种类型及特点。

sentences.english: Chinese New Year will usher in the New Year the first solar term spring.

sentences.english: There are twenty-four seasonal division points in Chinese lunar calendar.

sentences.chinese: 经过台架试验，节气门控制效果理想。

sentences.english: Today is the Beginning of Winter in 24 solar term .
sentences.chinese: 今天是二十四节气里的立冬。

sentences.english: The traditional Chinese lunar calendar divides the year into 24 solar terms.
sentences.chinese: 中国传统的农历将一年分为24个节气。

sentences.english: Today is the Beginning of Summer.
Grain Rain is one of the 24 solar terms.
sentences.chinese: 谷雨是二十四节气之一。

sentences.english: Today is in the Chinese 24 solar terms hoar frost descendings.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中国二十四节气中的霜降。

sentences.english: Monday is the Slight Heat, one of the 24 seasonal division points.

definition: the 24 solar terms, calculated from the position of the sun on the ecliptic, that divide the year into 24 equal periods
Winter Solstice, 22nd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 22nd December-5th January
Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
Great Cold, 24th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 20th January-3rd February
Chunfen or Spring Equinox, 4th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st March-4th April
Shuangjiang or Frost Descends, 18th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd October-6th November
Chushu or End of Heat, 14th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd August-7th September
nine periods of nine days each after winter solstice, the coldest time of the year
Xiazhi or Summer Solstice, 10th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 21st June-6th July
natural phenomena of a seasonal nature
Qiufen or Autumn Equinox, 16th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd September-7th October
Liqiu or Start of Autumn, 13th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-22nd August
season/time
Lesser Cold, 23rd of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 6th-19th January
Hanlu or Cold Dew, 17th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 8th-22nd October
Dashu or Great Heat, 12th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 23rd July-6th August
